Others: The Detroit Tigers lost the game against the Colorado Rockies, missing an opportunity to gain more ground in the American League Wild Card race.
Tarik Skubal, the Tigers' ace, was hit by a comebacker in the sixth inning, causing some concern about his health.
Initial X-rays for Skubal appear to be negative, which is encouraging news.
Skubal did not come out for the seventh inning as a precautionary measure.
The Tigers are set to face the Baltimore Orioles in a crucial series, with Skubal likely to miss at least one game due to the injury.
